text: xml-security-c does not build here using "make -j3" on a UP box (Fedora Core 1).
creator: ville.skytta@iki.fi

text:
Dependencies for the "all" build target were broken, and samples and tools would
build before the library was finished.  With dependencies fixes, "make -j 3" on
my system works.
creator: blautenb@apache.org
